Simple Start: What is Computation?
----------------------------------

**Computation** is just following a set of steps to solve a problem.

.. raw:: html

   <div class="simple-example">
     <h4>🍳 Real-Life Example: Making Toast</h4>
     <div class="example-steps">
       <div class="step-item">
         <span class="step-num">1</span>
         <span>Put bread in toaster</span>
       </div>
       <div class="step-item">
         <span class="step-num">2</span>
         <span>Set timer to 2 minutes</span>
       </div>
       <div class="step-item">
         <span class="step-num">3</span>
         <span>Wait for toast to pop up</span>
       </div>
       <div class="step-item">
         <span class="step-num">4</span>
         <span>Take out toast</span>
       </div>
     </div>
     <p class="example-note">
       <strong>That's computation!</strong> You followed clear steps to solve the "hungry" problem.
     </p>
   </div>

**In computer science terms:**
- **Input:** Bread + Hunger  
- **Process:** Toasting steps
- **Output:** Toast (problem solved!)

.. raw:: html

   <div class="help-box">
     <h4>🤔 Still Confused About Computation?</h4>
     <button class="help-toggle" onclick="toggleHelp('computation-help')">Get More Examples</button>
     <div class="help-content" id="computation-help" style="display: none;">
       <p><strong>More everyday computations:</strong></p>
       <ul>
         <li><strong>Getting dressed:</strong> Check weather → Choose clothes → Put them on</li>
         <li><strong>Finding a book:</strong> Think of title → Search library → Follow call numbers</li>
         <li><strong>Following GPS:</strong> Enter destination → Follow directions → Arrive</li>
       </ul>
       <p>See? You compute all day long! 🎉</p>
     </div>
   </div>
